name: DCS World: Iraq North Map
description: Dive into the rugged terrains and historically significant regions of Northern Iraq. This module offers a richly detailed environment featuring the mountainous landscapes, rivers, and urban centres that have been central to numerous military operations. From the ancient city of Mosul to the oil-rich fields of Kirkuk, Northern Iraq presents a challenging and varied theatre.

name: DCS World: Iraq Map
description: Experience the full scope of Iraq's diverse and historically rich environment with DCS: Iraq. Fly over the entire country, from the deserts of the south to the mountains of the north, and immerse yourself in a landscape that has been the backdrop for some of the most significant air campaigns in history.

name: The Holiday Bakeoff
description: Sin descripción

name: Murder Gods Play Pachinko
description:
A group of friends gathers in a remote house for the first time in two years.

This is the place where Kaya took his life. Tensions are high, to say the least.

The snowstorm isn't letting up. It appears they're trapped. The only company they have is each other.

Little do they know -- time isn't on their side.

He's on his way.

name: Home Sports
description:
Get ready to play, laugh, and move like never before! Step into a mixed-reality world with five dynamic sports that everyone can enjoy. Whether you’re hosting a friendly match or showing off your skills, Home Sports brings the action to life —all designed for social fun.

Pickleball - Our simplified rules make the game more intuitive than ever! Swing your paddle and try to outsmart your opponent without hitting the net.
Hockey - Experience what feels like a mix between ice hockey and air hockey with this original twist! Bounce the puck off the sides or go straight for the goal.
Bowling - It’s not how you bowl, it’s how you roll! Will you be able to make a perfect 300? Or will you become a gutterball guru?
⛳Mini Golf - Try to get as many hole-in-ones and birdies as possible in three different beautiful courses: classic, modern and nature.
Badminton - Play the fastest racket sport in the world for the first time in mixed reality!

Invite up to three friends to join you, locally or online, and compete in thrilling multiplayer action. Every sport adapts to your personal play space, making it easy to jump straight into the action. Whether you’re aiming for a hole-in-one in mini golf or defending the net in hockey, Home Sports is packed with endless entertainment, laughter, and competition.

Want to become the best of class? The game also features solo matches, drills and a career mode.

Experience your favorite sports like never before. Play today!

name: Fortnite Ballistic
description:
FORTNITE BALLISTIC is a first-person, 5v5 tactical FPS in Early Access. Prove your talents, precision and teamwork to overcome your opponents.

Each round, use your skills and gadgets to Attack and Defend your side. Avoid elimination and outplay your opponents to secure victory for your team.

TACTICAL CHOICES MATTER.
Choose your gadget and lock in! Fortnite Ballistic provides unique, Flex gadgets that can alter the outcome of a round. Once you’ve locked in your gadget, add it to your arsenal during the Buy phase of each round and go ballistic.

FIRST PERSON, FULL IMPACT
Fortnite Ballistic is the first Fortnite mode built using the First Person Camera Mode Device in UEFN. Experience Fortnite in an all new way, challenging your skills and testing your tactics.

Getting this experience is not necessary to access this content. When you launch Fortnite using this through your Library, the experience will be pre-selected for your convenience.

name: Sunset Irreligion
description: A spiritual successor to their previous WAD Fallen Leaves

name: Cookie Run India
description:
Enjoy a colorful running game—invite friends to play, laugh, and relax together!

Welcome to CookieRun India, the ultimate running game that combines fast-paced action, colorful graphics, and endless fun! In this exciting runner game, you’ll guide your Cookie characters through thrilling races, all while competing against friends and players from around the world. Are you ready to experience one of the most exciting running games on the market?

With smooth gameplay, no ads, and plenty of rewards and giveaways, CookieRun India brings a new level of excitement to the world of runner games. Get ready to immerse yourself in a game running experience like no other!

name: Chess Infinity
description:
Endless Strategy, Timeless Play

Whether you're new to chess or a seasoned player, welcome to Chess Infinity.

Immerse yourself in serene environments, hone your skills against masterful AI, and connect with players worldwide.

Embrace the challenge to grow, master your game, and discover the timeless beauty of chess, one thoughtful move at a time.

name: TankHead
description:
Embark on a thrilling journey as Whitaker, piloting a drone-controlled tank through the desolate ECA. Battle fierce enemies, scavenge valuable parts, and fight to survive in this fast-paced sci-fi world, as you strive to reach the mysterious Highpoint.

As Whitaker, your goal is to fight to reach Highpoint. To do that, you must traverse the Event Containment Area – an area where humans cannot survive. Whitaker must project his mind into a Needle, a robust drone capable of surviving in the harsh conditions of the ECA, and also of piloting your Tank. Use your Needle and Tank to combat the vehicles and creatures of the ECA to reach Highpoint.

Explore the ECA, a world torn apart by war and a mysterious cataclysmic event that left it uninhabitable by humans. Explore the Deadzone, where humans must “tele-project” their minds into drones in order to survive and pillage the remains of a once great society.

Your vehicle of choice is a Light Tank, capable of moving quickly and delivering devastating damage to your enemies and the reactive world around you. Your tank can be equipped with various weapons, armors, wheels, motors and abilities to customize your gameplay.

Use a variety of weaponry to dismantle your enemies, blow off their parts, and take a clear shot at their exposed weak points to deliver decisive blows. Defeated enemies will leave behind their remaining parts for you to salvage or steal. Take what you need, scrap the rest. Use everything to survive.

name: Short Trip
description: An interactive illustration five years in the making where you drive a cat tram through picturesque mountain villages. A relaxed, casual, delightful experience. Ding ding!

name: Chonkers
description: Chonkers is a cozy and relaxing idle game. Adopt the cutest fur balls and watch them ramp up the chonk scale as you play with them. Find them a new family. They’ll pay A LOT for your hefty chonker! Complete your collection by finding all the breeds and the rarest space cats!

name: Defensurvivor
description: DEFENSURVIVOR is a strategy game where you build obstacles and place and move units to block zombies. There are various units with unique characteristics and powerful high-level units that can be obtained through combination. Use randomly given units to survive until the end!

name: Lucky Summoner
description:
Want to play it by luck?
Tap to summon! Simple controls!
A new casual tower defense game is now available!

name: Fairy Tail 2: Lucy Outfit - "Miss Fairy Tail Contest"
description: A Lucy-specific outfit based on the episode "Miss FAIRY TAIL Contest" in the original work.

developers.name: KOEI TECMO BEJING SOFTWARE CO., LTD

name: Frog Escape
description: A frog girl, trapped in an underground lab, overhears a shocking plan to dispose of her. Determined to escape, she sets out to find freedom. Navigate obstacles, avoid enemies, and help her break free!

name: Card Guesser: Red or Black
description: Card Guesser: Red or Black is a simple and exciting guessing game. Players try to guess if the next card will be a red or a black card. Keep track of your progress with on-screen counters displaying your correct and incorrect answers. Perfect for testing your luck in a quick, engaging format! Are you feeling lucky?

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero - Centrair 20th Anniversary
description: Centrair 20th Anniversary! Tackle the toughest aviation puzzles with the special 'I am an Air Traffic Controller Airport Hero' game, in collaboration with Centrair!

name: Shiren the Wanderer: The Mystery Dungeon of Serpentcoil Island - Plus Pack
description: Ten new dungeons will be added to the adventures of Shiren and his companions on Serpentcoil Island. In addition, you can play Sacred Tree as Shiren's partner Koppa and the swordswoman Asuka!

name: Fateful Destiny
description: Can you uncover the truth, or will the mystery remain buried? Explore a village, make final choices, and shape a story you can never undo.

name: Kings of Emperor Bonaparte
description: A persistent online wargame set in Napoleonic Europe. Command infantry, cavalry, and artillery to achieve victory.

name: Hyper Tunnel
description: A roguelike action game, fly and fight in first person with 6 degrees of freedom!

name: Sugoroku Casino Party
description: Get ready for a thrilling adventure of strategy and luck! Let's play Sugoroku Casino Party!

name: Terror On the Bayou
description: Terror on the Bayou is a 3rd person, exploration horror game where you must navigate your canoe through a hostile bog, alone and afraid. Will you take up the mantle of lighthouse keeper to keep the bayou safe, or will you become prey along the way?

name: Last Pickup
description: In "Last Pickup," players navigate a post-apocalyptic world, carrying fuel to keep their vehicle running and jumping over obstacles in dangerous areas. Be careful not to drop items, as doing so will return you to the last save point.

name: This War of Mine: Forget Celebrations
description:
This is a charity initiative. All proceeds go to our partners: War Child, Amnesty International, Liberty Ukraine, and Indie Games Poland Foundation.

10 years have passed since the release of This War of Mine and the game’s message still remains poignant. In October 2024, the game was awarded a Special Recognition Award by Amnesty International. Sadly, the same award shows that the world hasn’t become a more peaceful place since the game launched in 2014. So instead of a big celebration, we’ve decided to dedicate this anniversary to doing the right thing. This War of Mine: Forget Celebrations is a DLC with a new story, special items, and, most importantly, a chance to support people in need.

name: There Exists Nobody
description: You arrive at a deserted street that feels familiar yet is filled with unease. Pick up your camera, capture the hidden anomalies, and break this endless loop.

name: Fledgling Manor
description: A supernatural horror visual novel where vampires compete to save their eternal unlives in a high-stakes reality show.

name: Gym Simulator Ultimate
description: Gym Simulator Ultimate is a first person simulation game. Run your own gym, buy more equipment, grow your business, attract more customer, be the best gym on the city.

name: Fairy Tail 2
description: The sequel to the 2020 "FAIRY TAIL" console game has finally arrived! Play as Fairy Tail guild members such as protagonists Natsu or Lucy, and experience first-hand how the dramatic events unfold in the series' climactic Alvarez Empire Arc. Enjoy epic battles against Zeref, the Emperor of the Alvarez Empire, his team of elites, the Spriggan 12, and the Black Dragon Acnologia.

name: Proto Garden
description: From a single beehive, pollinate your way to planetary regeneration. Grow flowers, automate honey production, and research new plants to assist the bees. Optimize your garden, paint new terrain, and watch the land come to life!

name: Gnomdom
description: Gnomdom is a point & click puzzle game where you find little gnomes stuck in various places and help them return to their home.

name: Swordhaven: Iron Conspiracy
description: Swordhaven is a classic party-based RPG. Explore the land of Nova Drakonia, embark on quests unique to your character, discover mysterious artefacts of the ancients, and unravel a hidden conspiracy that threatens the very existence of the world.

name: Driveland
description: In a peaceful world bathed in beautiful sunsets, find your place among the bad boys. Engage in missions and enjoy a vast selection of cars among your friends. However, don't forget to relax, have fun, and forge your path into adventure.

name: Exfil
description: In Exfil, you become a member of one of 4 competing teams tasked with retrieving intel. Using GPS skills, your goal is to locate and recover the intel then successfully exfiltrate.

name: What's Outside
description: You’re stuck out in the middle of space alone in ship, see how long you can survive with endless enemy ships and do all it again.

name: Only Straight and Up!
description: This is a fun and hardcore roguelike platformer for 1-5 players in which you have to reach the coveted reward by overcoming various traps! Only a few can make it through...

name: First Jam
description: The guardians of the fruit family - the banana warriors - stepped forward and picked up your favorite weapons, tried every way to become stronger, and fought against the evil food processing factory. Destroy their lair and make those who hurt their compatriots pay bloody price.

name: Voice Quest
description: Voice Quest, a 3D platformer, puts your voice in control. Guide Shadow Man through challenges, collect bananas, dodge strawberries, and compete for global records. Your adventure, your voice, your victory!

name: Lok Digital
description: Lok are a fresh new kind of living beings that spawned in the middle of a vast, incomprehensible world. Help them through mind-bending word-search puzzles and guide them towards expansion of their civilisation.

name: Aden
description: Dance! Dance! There's nothing to do but dance! A kawaii belt-scrolling dance battle for the new age! You save the world from destruction by controlling the mysterious girl and Akaka who appeared from the sky!

name: The Empress Quest: Full Moons Saga
description: Help Kobi the Dog to solve the secrets of his new house, find the Empress and return to his beloved Master with the help of mysterious Moon Mother. Immerse yourself in this whimsical adventure game with hand-painted backgrounds, quirky characters, light-hearted story and amazing music!

name: Wisper
description: Walk through a beautiful world filled with magical creatures, learn about them, the people, and the world on your journey to become a Wisper.

name: Rascal’s Escape
description:
Rascal's Escape is a co-op adventure game to satisfy your wanderlust.

Join the nimble Squirrel and the strong Bear on a wild journey. Jump, stomp, zoom through colorful cities following Rascal's clues. Travel Europe with your friends and experience nutastic moments.

name: Reavers of New Rome
description:
When your ancestors were exiled from New Rome, they left as Senators. Now, 100 years later, you return as a barbarian at the gates.

Reavers of New Rome is a 3D Action-Adventure Game. Take on the role of The Reaver as you invade the crumbling glory of New Rome. Explore the city, battle the Emperor's Legions, and defeat Emperor CRaC's Praetors, and eventually challenge the Emperor himself.

name: Pocket Cars
description: Pocket Cars is a fast paced arcade combat-racing game, where you can drive RC cars that speed through amazing tracks. From real-life obstacles to outstanding off-road abilities, maneuverability and boost capacity of the realistic looking vehicles, an amazing racing experience await for you.

name: Subtype Grounds
description: Subtype Grounds is a multiplayer simulation game where you can choose to play the role of a fugitive, military or a K-9 unit. As a fugitive, stay alive and complete your primary goal. As military, team up with K-9 units to track fugitives down.

name: Somnis: Rumble Rush
description: Somnis: Rumble Rush is an engaging real-time strategy game that combines strategic deck-building with fast-paced combat. Players enter the dream realm of Somnis, constructing diverse decks of units, buildings, and spells to compete in both PvP and PvE battles. The game offers a blend of PC RTS depth with mobile gaming convenience, allowing for strategic gameplay anytime, anywhere.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Dark Angels Chapter Pack
description:
Bear the honoured colours of the Dark Angels with the Dark Angels Chapter Pack!

This DLC contains an exclusive Champion skin for the Bulwark and his shield, three weapon skins, and over 40 cosmetic items from 8 Dark Angels Successor Chapters.

name: Maximum Football: Legend Edition Bundle
description: Lead your team to victory in the ultimate football simulation game that is Free to Play! Rule the gridiron with realistic, physics-based gameplay that allows every play to be unique. Fully customize your team, recruit your dream roster, and take it to the gridiron locally or online to cement your legacy.

name: Wingspan Oceania Deluxe Bundle
description: Create the most amazing bird habitats in this complete Wingspan experience.

name: Hapunan
description: Sin descripción

name: 1x1
description: Become a little soul lost in a dangerous factory, avoid obstacles and battle bosses. A challenging bullet hell game where you advance by opening and closing doors!

name: Conradito Cafézito
description: It costs the price of a coffee – but it lasts much longer! Conradito Cafézito, is an idle and incremental game where you unlock recipes, automate processes, and expand your coffee empire while watching your profits rise with every click!

name: CELL 0: Cyber Entertainment Leisure Lounge
description: CELL is a short non-linear visual novel in a post-apocalypse/cyberpunk setting. Kenzo is an artificially grown human who lived his entire life alone isolated with a sweet, but artificial service intelligence. He's not okay. Help him to go through the disturbing situation he's about to get into.

name: Crosstown Carnage
description:
Crosstown Carnage is 1 large map that was originally conceived as a mini-episode.
After clearing the aliens out of the West Coast of the USA, Duke heads back east to start the cleanup there. From the tops of skyscrapers, Duke will have to navigate the city's old subway system to find where the Battlelord has been hiding.

Crosstown Carnage contains two new alien types: the Freeze Trooper and the Expander Trooper. The Freeze Trooper fires freezer blasts at Duke. These pack a punch, but won't immediately kill you. The Expander Trooper fires blasts of microwaves which will fry Duke. Hit enough, and Duke expands until he explodes. Both may drop their respective ammo when they die.

name: Arima Lodge
description: Arima Lodge is a free, 5-minute, fixed-camera short story that takes place entirely inside an elevator. It features limited dialogue options from Kai's perspective, and on-screen QTE events to open and close the elevator doors when a new character enters.

name: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - Season of Deathstroke
description: Season of Deathstroke of Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League delivers the final content updates for the game, bringing new features and enhancements. This season introduces Deathstroke as a playable character, alongside new melee weapons, Infamy sets, Notorious gear, and a fresh map called Elseworlds Mayhem. The season is divided into two episodes—Episode 7: Control and Episode 8: Balance—culminating in a battle against Brainiac.

name: Error Codes
description: You Go in Pursuit of you Best Friend who has recently gone missing. but your spaceship gets shot down by a rogue group of Robots. With no communication with earth, you must survive, Fight, and discover the secrets of this Ice Planet. (2024)

name: New Year's Jam
description: Sin descripción

name: Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy
description: A port of Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Real Bird Fake Bird
description:
Sort the real birds from the fake birds,
with new topics daily.

name: Toaplan Arcade Collection 4
description: Toaplan Arcade 4 for Evercade brings together 6 more all-action arcade hits from the beloved Japanese developer Toaplan. Blast off for explosive action in the shoot ’em ups Dogyuun and Grind Stormer, enjoy cartoony platform fun in Snow Bros. 2 and Pipi and Bibi’s, and hit the streets in the wrestling-themed beat ’em up Knuckle Bash.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Ultima Founding
description: The Primaris are ready to step in the battle for the God Emperor and the Holy Throne. Eight new units and unique gameplay mechanics will give you more options for the fight for Gladius Prime.

name: Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves
description: Dive into a world of cunning heists and honor among thieves. Experience Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves originally released on the PlayStation 2 console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Sly 2: Band of Thieves
description: Join Sly and crew in a daring heist to outsmart villains worldwide. Experience Sly 2: Band of Thieves originally released on the PlayStation 2 console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Wanted
description: Top-down barrage shooter. Refer to the Vampire Ancient Survivor Meat Pigeon gameplay to add barrage, random character attributes, and random equipment.

name: Duck Eggs
description: Welcome to Duck Eggs, an innovative game that mixes desktop pet, collection, trading, clicking and surprise elements together. In this world, you'll collect all kinds of rare and fantastic duck eggs . Eventually, you can exchange them for money to help the duck go back to her original world.

name: Industrial Annihilation
description: The next major game in the Planetary Annihilation universe, Industrial Annihilation combines the iconic real-time strategy of the beloved Annihilation games with deep factory-building to deliver a blend of genres unlike any you’ve experienced before.

name: Cast Dice Away
description: A board game-style survival adventure on a deserted island! In Cast Dice Away, roll dice to explore the island, gather resources, and survive. Each roll triggers unpredictable events, challenging you to strategically navigate diverse environments as you seek escape.

name: The Short Bread Game
description: A cozy platformer where you help a piece of bread get to the bakery for breakfast. Though your path there may not be the most direct, you'll get to explore charming places. Jump high, run from enemies, and engage in witty dialogue with your odd new friend.

name: Overwatch 2: Season 14 - Hazard
description: Introducing Hazard, the new Tank hero, embodying the spirit of anarchy for the greater good. Then test your skills with a unique blend of past and present in the 6v6 Role Queue event, using the 2-2-2 setup. Plus, master the elements with an Overwatch 2 x Avatar: The Last Airbender collab event, celebrating unity, resilience, and the power within. And don’t miss out on Mythic Thor Reinhardt.

name: Dungeons 4: Not Another Multiverse
description: Tristan and Thalya are thrown into yet another multiverse and Thalya makes an astounding discovery: The demonic and hordic inhabitants hate them BOTH. There is only one way out of this – and it’s by joining the forces of Evil and Good to find a way back into your own world.

name: Ready or Not: Dark Waters
description: At approx. 0800 hours this morning a critical situation occurred on offshore oil rig “HeavyWell A-101" and was responded to via tactical response by LSPD SWAT. The “United Peoples Front,” designated by the US Government as a terror group, claimed responsibility for this hostage incident. The situation is still ongoing, further investigation and situation reports are under the jurisdiction of FISA.

name: The Outlast Trials: Project Breach
description: Sin descripción

name: The Last Refuge
description: Sin descripción

name: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 2 Remastered
description:
Experience Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 2 in original form or with remastered graphics.

Soul Reaver 2 picks up where Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver left off, with Raziel having just plunged through the Chronoplast time portal in his relentless pursuit of Kain. Over the course of his quest for revenge, Raziel must unearth the mysteries of Nosgoth’s ancient races, expose the machinations behind the corruption of the Pillars, and the vampire genocide. Throughout the game, Raziel acquires numerous new abilities, weapon enhancements, and spells, all of which are critical to the completion of his epic adventure.

Soul Reaver is a third-person combat adventure filled with devious puzzles and kick-ass combat. Fly, swim, jump, and even travel from the material world to the spectral realm to overcome obstacles and conquer your enemies. With over 40 abilities to choose from, no two fights will ever be the same.

name: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver Remastered
description:
Experience Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver in original form or with remastered graphics.

After the events of Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain, Kain has created a vampiric empire in the world of Nosgoth. One of Kain's children and underlings, Raziel, is disgraced and cast down by a jealous Kain after surpassing him by growing wings and woken up centuries after in a corrupted form to get revenge against his once-brothers.

name: Bodycam Zombie Shooter
description: Bodycam Zombie Shooter is a first-person shooter set in during the zombie apocalypse.

name: Shape Shifter
description: Create, discover and share levels, compete for the best times and discover hidden secrets. In this sandbox platformer, whether you're a triangle, circle or square dictates how you solve puzzles and clear levels! each shape has their own unique abilities that completely change the game.

name: Alex and the Aliens
description: In ALEX AND THE ALIENS: Collapse of Time, you play as Alex, a survivor in a world ravaged by an alien invasion. Navigate a devastated Earth, battle deadly enemies, and make critical choices that will determine the fate of humanity. Can you stop the collapse, or will you risk rewriting the future?

name: Ship of Mist
description: In the future world, artificial intelligence will replace the human brain, causing humans to lose their dreams and self-awareness. Weak Water will steal dream storage tanks to restore self-awareness and earn rich rewards for a small number of people, but she will encounter various thrilling events.

name: Wartales: The Skelmar Invasion
description: Plunge into Ormance, a once-defended county now overrun by the largest invasion in its history. The Skelmars, united for the first time under the cruel High Jarl Sven, chosen by the Gods, have joined forces to raid Edoran in a ruthless quest for its riches and fertile lands. This unprecedented alliance of clans has torn through the region, spreading chaos and ruin in its wake.

name: Flip Flop XL
description:
A minimalist one button flipping game.

Press and hold to begin crouching, and then release to jump, flip, and fall to pieces. Time your jumps to perform flips and land on your feet, get as many flips as you can in a row and beat your friends scores.

name: Terminator: Dark Fate - Defiance: We are Legion
description:
We Are Legion is the first DLC for Terminator: Dark Fate - Defiance, a gritty real-time strategy game set in the intense universe of Terminator: Dark Fate.

It plunges players back into the heart of the conflict as they take command of Legion, the relentless machine army fighting to dominate a shattered world. This DLC expands on the story, focusing on Legion’s mission to eradicate human resistance and assert dominance over a world ravaged by war.

name: Nabi
description: Can you escape this abyss, a place of despair and evil? Pride, lust, greed, jealousy, indolence, gluttony, anger Defy their temptations!

name: Tilebreaker Next Level
description: Destroy blocks covering the Earth in this top-down shooter. Dodge enemy attacks, face off against bosses, and unlock powerful abilities. Levels get progressively more challenging. Save the Earth!

name: Eden Survivors
description: Welcome, hackers, you're being transferred to Eden City to defend its citizens against the alien threat! Eden Survivors is a single-player survivor-like auto-shooter where players must defeat hordes of alien invaders until the extraction time.

name: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 1 & 2 Remastered
description: Experience the epic conflict of Kain and Raziel in original form or with remastered graphics.

name: Terratopia: March of The Demon King
description: Terratopia: March of The Demon King is narrative puzzle game, a choose your own adventure, and a love letter to the RPGs of your childhood.

name: Dagger Froggy
description: Dagger Froggy is a small action Roguelike, Where you face hordes of enemies... Cute? With each round you get stronger, But so do the cute creatures. >:)

name: DigDigDrill
description: DigDigDrill is an underground mining and resource collecting game. Dig freely for minerals and treasures. Use the items you collect to forge your original drills in a hack-and-slash style equipment system.

name: Revenge of Black Bone
description: Welcome to the seductive and perilous world of "Revenge of Black Bone," the eagerly awaited sequel to the smash hit game "Curse of Black Bone." Set sail once more for the sun-kissed shores of Port Royal, where treasures gleam, mysteries whisper, and beautiful women captivate.

name: Fast Food Simulator
description: Welcome to the world's most chaotic place! Play solo or co-op with up to 6 players. Run a fast-food restaurant, and work with your friends to expand your business. Take orders, make burgers, and increase your earnings by dealing with customers.

name: Hidden in Clickville
description: Discover the charming inhabitants of Clickville across the four seasons, as you assist them in locating their misplaced items. Search for all the hidden objects across various levels. The grateful townsfolk of Clickville will be sooo happy! Surprise bonus level for you!

name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita’s Rewind
description: In Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita's Rewind, the team faces off against a robotic reincarnation of the Power Rangers' long-time nemesis. Robo-Rita has conjured a portal to send herself back in time so she can finally vanquish the Power Rangers by forming an alliance with her younger self.

name: Where Are We?
description: Trapped in an unknown space for unknown reasons, the two adventurers must now turn their teamwork for finding treasure into one for survival and escape! Will adventurers escape from the unknown space and get treasure again?

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - Astra Militarum
description:
For the Emperor!

Astra Militarum, the backbone of the Imperium’s might, are ready to fight in Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector. Sixteen new units are available to defend and fight for the Emperor.

name: Haloo
description: Fight the endless mass of enemies, collect loot, get stronger and Haloo!

name: Rise & Muse
description: "Rise & Muse" is a single-player game that blends RPG, deck-building, and Roguelike elements. Set in the land of Muse, you will engage in strategic battles against formidable enemies, unravel the seal of the male deity, defeat the goddess, and restore world order.

name: The Carnival Of Company
description: A dark action-adventure with rogue-like RPG elements, 'The Carnival of Company' lets you defeat demons, consume their essence for power, and customize combat with the 'Path of Carnival.' Uncover secrets, exact revenge, and shape your destiny.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Megastructures
description: Advance to Type II civilization in Galactic Civilizations IV with the Megastructures expansion. Harness star power for awe-inspiring constructions like Dyson Spheres and Interstellar Gateways, each offering unique benefits. Think bigger and redefine your galactic scope!

name: Ballionaire
description: BALLIONAIRE is a physics-based pachinko-builder. Find and exploit outrageous synergies. Theorycraft and bonk your way to victory. Welcome to the autobonker genre!

name: Voin
description: Fight hordes of enemies in fast-paced first-person hack-and-slash battles. Explore the world of dark fantasy filled with secrets and dangers, and master your skill of wielding primordial elements.

name: The Last Three
description: In the depths of a magical, peaceful forest lives the last stone tiger family, guardians of balance and protectors of the mystical creatures' realm. Their tranquil life is thrown into turmoil when a dark power invades, kidnapping the mother to use the family's powers for their own ends. The father and cub set out on a journey to find and rescue her, restoring harmony to the forest while facing a brave and determined adventure against the forces of darkness and mystery.

name: Thief Simulator: Shopping Center
description: To access this content you need to have the game Thief Simulator on Steam.

name: Kooky Kids Fort Defense
description: Tower Defense x Roguelite! Recruit Kids with branching upgrade paths, buy powerful Items, and earn randomized strategic Perks to defend your Fort against the Brats! Various challenging environments, Brats, and Bosses await you and the Kooky Kids.

name: MiSide
description: MiSide is an adventure game with horror elements, telling the story of a simple guy who, for mystical reasons, finds himself in a mobile simulation. Appearing in the house he has just observed on his smartphone screen, the hero becomes confused. The stunned guy follows the instructions of a certain device he discovered in the bedroom. A few moments later, he is greeted by a pretty girl, whose image is also familiar to the young man from this mobile game.

name: Deck of Souls
description: Roguelite deck-building meets souls-like. Break out of an infinite loop to close the hell gates, turn enemies into cards, and build your own omnipotent Deck of Souls! Rolls included.

name: Astrometica
description: Astrometica is a fun game about surviving in space. You need to use your skills and tools to stay alive. There are many challenges to face, and you need to fight to survive. You also need to build a new base in space.

name: Magical Magic World
description: Pixel art side-scrolling comical fantasy magical action sent by Vtuber magical girl!! This game is an orthodox side-scrolling 2D action game.You can experience various worlds from the beginning with the stage selection type.

name: Mammon: Devil Help
description: Mammon: Devil Help is a turn-based, resource management, indirect battle between you and the will of any unfortunate victims. Drive them to desperation and buy their souls while being a human in the shoes of the Devil.

name: The Kynge's Gambit
description: A deckbuilding roguelite game with RPG elements and dungeon delving in a dark fantasy setting. Pick a class, select a style and improve upon it by leveling your stats and improving your deck. Fight, die, progress, repeat.

name: Go Home Annie
description: A twisted first person horror adventure. As an employee of the SCP Replication Division you are tasked with testing artificially developed paranormal events. Solve puzzles, converse with anomalous entities and explore multiple paths to untangle the secrets behind the Replication Division.

name: Copycat: Cee Ann
description: Copycat: Cee Ann is an action platformer with RPG elements, featuring a feline protagonist named Cee Ann. Players navigate through various stages, combining speed and combat while mastering environmental challenges. The game offers a skill point system that allows players to switch between abilities, crafting their own playstyle as they progress. As Cee Ann, players can customize their approach to each scenario, building their character's capabilities throughout the adventure.

name: Naiad
description: A relaxing and colorful exploration adventure about flowing by a river. Immerse yourself in a relaxing, minimalist and colorful exploration adventure. Flow with Naiad across a mysterious river and interact with its fauna and flora to discover little secrets. A very personal and unique game created with love by a solo dev.

name: Urban Strife
description: Urban Strife is an old-school TBS, where you lead a team of makeshift, slightly deranged militia in an effort to keep the small community of Urban Shelter alive, amidst a zombie pandemic. With what’s left of human civilization divided into factions fighting over the scraps, you will need to broker alliances and fight factions wars, fortify and rebuild your community and forge a future against the ever-present threat of the zombie horde.

name: Monument Valley III
description:
Begin a thrilling new voyage into an enchanting puzzle world. Navigate optical illusions to bring together a village and guide them to a new home.

Set sail for adventure in this new installment of the award-winning Monument Valley game series, exploring an expansive and beautiful world of puzzles. When an apprentice lightkeeper named Noor discovers that the world's light is fading — and waters rising — she must go on a quest to find a new source of power before her community is lost to the waves forever.

name: Worm Girlfriend Dating Simulator
description: A short visual novel with physics-based movement about waking up as a worm and finding love.

name: 2Synth
description: Use your synthesizer to manipulate and match video signals in this Y2K aesthetic, arcade, puzzle game!

name: Kozue's Strange Journey 2
description: One year after taking down the supernatural threat behind a series of disappearances, Sayuri Shirasagi and her friends team up once more to unravel a new mystery!

name: C.A.S.T
description: C.A.S.T is a third-person PvE extraction shooter playable solo or in co-op. Select your character and loadout to battle enemy hordes, evade anomalies, and complete objectives across handcrafted maps with dynamic procedural elements.

name: VR Store Simulator
description: Step into a dynamic VR supermarket! Manage your store, stock shelves, cater to customers, and create the ultimate shopping destination . Perfect for fun and learning, this immersive simulation lets you strategize and thrive in supermarket management. Ready to start?

name: Christmas Chaos
description: Christmas Chaos is a multiplayer party game perfect for the holiday spirit! Team up with friends and dive into 2 exciting modes. Get ready for holiday fun and laughter!

name: BDSM Fuel Station: Interactive Physics Simulation
description: This is a game that utilizes real physics simulation, where the protagonist interacts with props in the scene through a physics simulation engine. Therefore, every time you play, it offers you a different experience.

name: Rise of Eros: Desire
description: "Rise of Eros: Desire" is a AAA mobile game crafted with a realistic 3D style, featuring 360-degree real-time visuals that showcase the characters' finely detailed facial features and every inch of their skin. The game is designed with top-tier standards in visuals and sound effects, while also offering deep strategic gameplay and character development mechanics, providing players with a thrilling fantasy adventure.

name: Kraken City
description: She is the dark magician, an apostle of the great Kraken, Nialato. Show the foolish mortals the terrifying power of the Kraken through brute strength and magical prowess Experience the thrill of hack-and-slash action alongside the fearsome Kraken

name: How to: Superhero!
description: Sin descripción

name: Finding America: New England - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Digseum
description: Digseum is a short, unique incremental journey about digging up ancient relics and building the greatest museum ever! Excavate for ancient relics across the world, manage your resources and upgrade your abilities, and build the biggest and greatest museum the world has ever seen!

name: World Explorer Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Toy Box
description: A pull-apart puzzle visual novel whose fragments stitch the story together.

name: DodgeCraft
description: DodgeCraft is a VR game that blends high-octane fun with a full-body workout! Perfect for fans of Dodgeball, Rugby or Football, DodgeCraft will challenge your evasion and tackling skills like never before!

name: Backrooms: Inside the Escape
description: Venture through a labyrinth of seemingly endless, creepily familiar corridors based on popular Creepypasta lore.

name: A Bibelot: Y-Type
description: Sin descripción

name: Dimensional Illusion
description: Dimensional illusion is a real-time strategy game that combines role-playing with friendly placement. Each map scene is a new experience, and by combining friendly formations and skill combinations, lead your character to defeat powerful bosses.

name: Morrigan's Isle
description: Stave off waves of enemies that grow in strength and number as each night passes and defend the Tree of Life. Survive, harvest resources, craft armor and weapons, outfit helper NPCs, and build a base protected by auto-firing towers. Explore the island to find gear with the power of the Celtic Gods.

name: My Plushy Shift
description: In My Plushy Shift, your Task is to collect around the Office. Sounds simple enough, though things get difficult as you start hallucinating about toys and - walking Plushies. Collect around all Rooms while struggling through the Plushy Hallucinations.

name: Unpunished
description: UNPUNISHED game is a horror story game that is endowed with good, realistic graphics and plot

name: Tetrominer
description: Sin descripción

name: Gorf the Frog
description: Become a lost frog searching for its destiny in a brutal world filled with dangers. GORF combines classic road-crossing gameplay with soulslike punishing difficulty. Uncover the dark truth behind your seemingly simple mission.

name: Unexpected Pigeon Race
description: A pigeon racing game (Checkpoint system) the race passes through ancient Egyptian historical sites (Abu Simbel, Philae, Edfu, Luxor, Karnak, Hatshepsut, Dendera, Abydos and Pyramids).

name: Laundry Store Simulator
description: Start small and work your way up, upgrading your equipment, designing a stylish store, and expanding your services! Are you ready to own the best Laundry Store in the world?

name: Facing the Rain
description: Sin descripción

name: Containment Corp, Inc.
description: A co-op horror game where you team up with friends to hunt anomalies and collect rare loot. Customize your loadouts, your looks, much more!

name: Somewhere
description: The goal of SOMEWHERE is to survive on the wild island of Esterhull. Gather resources, craft tools, and manage hunger, thirst. Explore mysterious locations, uncover the secrets of a lost civilization, and interact with other players: form alliances or compete for survival in a hostile environment.

name: Cannoneer
description: Cannoneer is a 2-dimensional, top down shooter game. You bomb planes to earn treasure and get new high scores. You can use that treasure to purchase skins and use those in game. The main gimmick of your cannon is that you only have one bomb. Every time the bomb leaves the screen you get it back. The cannon is stationary, but you can rotate in place at a set speed. The game mechanics include 30-second waves of planes that change direction and location every wave, speed increases per each wave, an explosive grenade that spawns after you shoot 15 times, and intense situations coupled with high-speed gameplay. You can track your best scores with the scores tab in the menu, and compete with your friends to get the best score. Good luck!

name: Tobacco Shop Simulator
description: Run your tobacco shop. Sign contracts with leading brands, order products, hire workers, expand your store, and never let your customers leave the store empty-handed. Play with friends or go solo, and enjoy the growth of your shop.

name: MasterChef: Culinary Showdown
description: Master the Kitchen, Challenge the World! Sharpen your knives and compete with global chefs in wacky mini-games. Master over 120 recipes, unlock culinary challenges, upgrade your kitchen, and become the ultimate MasterChef.

name: Road Maintenance Simulator 2: Winter Services
description: In Road Maintenance Simulator 2, take on a variety of authentic tasks that occur every day in a road maintenance depot - now including winter service! Choose from a wide selection of tools, attachments and vehicles to master the challenges ahead.

name: A Shelter Full of Cats
description: A Shelter Full of Cats is a hidden object game set in a cat shelter specially designed for cats with special needs. Join the Shelter's manager, Hannah, as she prepares a charity party to help these cats find their forever homes. Let's show that love has no boundaries!

name: Dogs
description: Dogs is a relaxing and fun game where you click on adorable dogs to earn points. Featuring a variety of cute dog breeds, simple gameplay, and charming visuals, it's perfect for dog lovers and players of all ages.

name: Judofuri
description: You only need one button to compete in this fruity party game! Press it, squeeze it & mash it in a series of silly mini-games for 2 to 9 players and claim your spot as the juiciest fruit of ‘em all!

name: The Restless Sheep & The Lone Wolf: Woolly Eyes Gaiden
description: The romantic noir visual novel The Restless Sheep & The Lone Wolf returns to Kabukicho in this unhinged simul-quel. Me, Azami, and the whole ragtag gang rampage through five all-new short stories!

name: Bat to the Heavens
description: A bat and your wit is all you need to surpass any obstacle! Climb and surpass the heavens, and discover the secrets across the valley in this challenging momentum - execution - puzzle game!

name: The Restless Sheep & The Lone Wolf: A Tale of Cutthroat Lovers
description: In this twisted love story of a visual novel by CLOCKUP, an insomniac must decide whether to protect his position as a yakuza bigwig’s pet killer or the mysterious woman who can put him to sleep.

name: I Made Myself a Ship
description: Build progressively bigger, faster, tankier, more agile, more dangerous, more complicated, more projectile-y-ier ships in your goal to destroy and collect everything.

name: Roboban: Colors
description: Roboban: Colors is a single player Sokoban style puzzle video game in which you control robots that have to reach their recharge sites, but not before ordering the boxes in their corresponding destination.

name: Babe-lathe
description: Climb and explore the Queen's tower-island in this grid-based 3D platformer filled with bonk-like random encounters, mischievous ghosts, tricky jumps and a horrible, horrible curse..

name: Reversi xVSx
description: Playtest release From Japan Time 2024/ 3/ 29 5:30 to 2024/ 4/ 15 23:59. It is set to open signup, so you can join without approval. There is no obligation to report bugs. REVERSI xVSx is a party game where 1 to 10 people can play Reversi. You can play CPU battle or up to 5 vs 5 online matches

name: Duckthing's Rolling Rooms
description: A room based puzzle-platformer with a weird duck.

name: A Date with Death: Beyond the Bet
description: Extend your bet with the Grim Reaper himself and fall in love all over again in A Date with Death - Beyond the Bet! Create your own character, decorate your apartment, and chat away with the charming yet dangerous Grim Reaper through text and video calls.

name: Arts & Hearts Academy
description: Arts & Hearts Academy: first dark academia romantic visual novel with a detective storyline, where you play as an architecture student, and your goal is to win an architectural competition, uncover a mysterious crime at the academy, and find love. Are you ready? Let's get started!

name: Chester The Chest
description: Play as an animated chest named Chester, embracing the captivating atmosphere and breathtaking scenery as you guide him on his journey. Play around solving simple puzzles and uncover cool objects and secrets.

name: GridRoad
description: GridRoad is a traffic optimisation simulation game. Build roads, place roadsigns and tweak traffic lights to build the most efficient traffic junction!

name: Undead West
description:
Undead West is a western themed roguelite bullet hell where the player uses an array of weapons, whiskey infusions and buffs gained from defeating bosses to complete each stage.

The cowboy you play has been killed in a revolver duel against the Man in Red. Death agrees to resurrect you so that you may carry out your quest for revenge. But there is a catch. Death requests that you pay back your revival debt in souls. Every adversary killed on the road to vengeance grants you a soul that can be used to unlock various new guns to use, as well as whiskey - a mixture used during combat for short boost.

Viewing the action from top down perspective, navigate the hazard filled areas swarming with demons, skeletons and swarms upon swarms of bullets to reach each of the ominous bosses culminating in a fight against the Man in Red.

Shoot your way through enemies, dodge through numerous traps, unlock new guns and whiskey boons as well as colorful outfits in this western noir tinged shooter.

name: Paper Perjury
description:
Investigating a simple robbery reveals a tapestry of mysteries!

Solve a series of cases as newly hired police clerk Justina Smith and find out the truth behind a string of suspicious crimes. Work with the energetic detective Ernest Hunt and dig for clues in the paper trail to discover the secrets that paperwork can hide.

name: Dustland
description: Dustland is a significantly new look on survival. It's a shooter where escapes, looting, and battles are just a veil hiding the world's mysteries. It's a captivating adventure from a dozen seasons, where uncovering the truth will change everything. Only a few will be able to reach the real answers…

name: Puropu Defense Squad
description: Co-op action-tower-defense game where you defend your precious extractor against hordes of wacky humans. Build dozens of traps, turrets, items and use your hero’s abilities in 1-4 player campaigns, and against other players in unique PvP game modes!

name: Among Ashes
description: Among Ashes is a terrifying first-person survival horror game. Your friend has sent you a link to a game that someone posted online, but as you play you quickly realise that something is terribly wrong. Whatever you do… K̴͉͚̗̅̃̄E̷͓̤̺̊͠E̴̤̰̿̽P̴̠̳̀́ ̴̨̮̭̕̚P̷̠͇̳͐̓̀L̶̹̔Ả̷̧Y̵̘̺͆̓Ï̸̻̏͂N̷͙̯͊G̵͖̹̠̽̿.

name: Songs of the Hmong
description: The culture of Chinese Hmong nationality boasts pluralistic artistry, and it has its own uniqueness in construction, literature, painting, patterns, craft, etc. However their ways of inherit the knowledge is limited due to the absence of written language. In present days, the younger generation is showing a huge passion about video games, thus demonstrating a possibility for young people to grow interest on these fading traditional cultures by binding them with the Ninth Art.

name: Magnet Jack
description: Magnet Jack is a 90's parody puzzle-platformer. Jack has an ever-changing variety of wacky mechanics in over 150 stages that will both make you think and challenge your reflexes. Plus a top-down overworld with off-the-wall themes and characters.

name: Stars in the Trash
description: Stars in the Trash brings the magic of animated movie classics into a narrative-driven platformer that combines action, exploration and puzzles. Tired of feeling trapped at home, Moka, a spoiled cat decides to run away and seek adventure. Explore, make friends, fight, and escape from the kennelman.

name: Blade of God II: Orisols
description: "Blade of God 2" is a 3D hard-core action game. In this game, players will be one of the painful, sadness, ordinary, but great heroes; to adventure among the huge and mysterious Nordic kingdoms, to fight with the “sacrificers” who once lost their "destiny", and launch a self-salvation travel.

name: Only Lead Can Stop Them
description: Only Lead Can Stop Them is a retro FPS set in the Spanish Civil War. Fight the Fascist Hordes!

name: Paper Trails
description: It all started with a simple robbery. When that thread was pulled, a tapestry of mysteries were revealed. Solve cases and outsmart criminals in a detective story full of lies, confessions, and maybe even a murder or two.

name: Chrysalis
description:
Defend your Chrysalis from growing hordes of monsters in this hybrid game that combines elements of tower defense, survival, and roguelike RPGs. Explore procedurally generated levels, possess and control animals, and grow deadly gardens. How far can you get before the next wave of monsters attacks?

In Chrysalis, you play the role of an incorporeal Wisp tasked with defending a magical Chrysalis from the forces of disease, dark magic, and death. The Wisp cannot physically interact with the world, but it can draw power from the natural world and inhabit animals and plants. Using these powers, the Wisp must explore the world and use what it finds to defend the Chrysalis at all costs.

name: Janosik 2
description: Janosik 2 is a retro action-platformer with metroidvania elements. Get ready to jump, slash, dodge roll, dive, smash and bash your way through deadly traps, mischievous villains, troublesome bosses and more in this sequel to Janosik. You've never played a fairytale this cheerful and deadly.

name: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
description: Uncover one of history’s greatest mysteries in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, a first-person, single-player adventure set between the events of Raiders of the Lost Ark and The Last Crusade. You’ll become the legendary archaeologist in this cinematic action-adventure game from MachineGames, the award-winning studio behind the recent Wolfenstein series, and executive produced by Hall of Fame game designer Todd Howard.

name: NoseBound
description: An adventure game like no other. A detective story in the vein of Film Noir. An unusual path into a paranormal realm.

name: Wild Woods
description: Wild Woods is a couch co-op game full of action, teamwork and woodland critters. One to four players take on the role of brave little cats defending their wooden wagon on its way through a dangerous forest. Clever cooperation is key - their way is full of obstacles!

name: Mafia Online Town Asleep
description:
Card mafia, only with a choice of roles and online

Do you want to play mafia, but the company doesn't have enough players? Then you were looking for what you needed! Complete daily tasks, compete for rankings, join clans and fight for territories, and much more in our game!

The players are divided into two sides — mafia and civilians. The mafia's task is to kill civilians, and the civilians' task is to find the mafia and execute it by any means necessary. Can you lie to the city?

Our features: frequent game updates, the ability to choose your favorite role, responsive administration, many interesting roles with unique mechanics have been added, two game modes, including the classic one, close to the sports mafia, and much more!

name: Greengrocer Simulator 2024
description: Can you rebuild a career that has hit rock bottom? Strive to rise from nothing to the top. Arrange your fruits & vegetables however you like. Keep track of price updates. Play the stock market and aim for the top. Meet people and grab a drink. Show the whole world who's the best.

name: The Ghost That Lives Inside My Piano
description: Sin descripción

name: Black Fairy
description: A new wintery map: Black Fairy on its black red wings! Contains lots of enemies, explosions, boom-booms, and there's also one snowman. In addition, it contains a calmer variation of the map called "White Noiz" which is meant to be played after Black Fairy

name: Nightfall House
description: Nightfall House is a first-person walking simulator game that allows you to feel as if someone is always around.

name: CyberSeas
description: Race around sunken streets in your jet ship, swing between collapsed skyscrapers with your trusty harpoon and build your reputation amongst the colourful inhabitants of the CyberSeas!

name: Pro Flight Simulator
description: With stunningly realistic exterior and cockpit views, you'll feel like a true pilot as you switch between multiple camera angles to find that perfect perspective. Fly through 40 challenging levels.

name: Marry a Deep One
description: Establish your bloodline, lead a sinister cult and manage an isolated seaside village, where aquatic monsters crossbreed with humans. Use social manipulation and occult magic to slow down the inevitable descent into a spiral of madness.

name: Astraea
description: Unleash bolts, set traps, and bash through relentless hordes of minions to protect a little girl from Hera’s wrath.

name: Intruder Alert
description: Intruder Alert is an action-stealth 2D adventure combined with multiple other genres packed into a single game. Stealthily avoid other shapes, defeat them when necessary, and complete various tasks along your journey.

name: Outbreak: Loremaker Collection
description: A deserted mansion out in the woods swarming with the undead... a survival horror nightmare as old as time itself.

name: Shadow Prisoner
description:
"Shadow Prisoner" is a 2D fighting game with simple controls that allow you to perform exhilarating combos.

You can play with 25 characters (9 will be added for free, and one is a collaboration character that will be paid DLC).

Even if you have no experience with fighting games, you can use the simple mode to play like an experienced fighting gamer just by repeatedly pressing buttons.

There are story mode and survival mode for single player, and versus mode and network mode for competitive play.

Network mode has a zero-latency netcode that supports rollback.

If you are playing in Japan, you can play with the same input sensation as if you were playing next to someone in Japan.

In addition, Epsilon mode, a fighting action game where you shoot each other with a barrage of bullets, exclusive to the Steam version, will be added.

name: Fear The Unknown: Dave Story
description:
In the first episode of Fear the unknown ,In the game, you will play as one of the lucky ones who met them and survived.

This game offers a first-person narrative experience, blending walking simulation with elements of exploration, driving, drinking, and interactive conversations.

name: Waifu Simulator: Horem Edition
description: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

name: Senpai and the Mysterious Island
description: An RPG where you get to uncover the secrets of a mysterious island inhabited by succubi that was rumored to contain a lost ancient technology. Play as either the warrior Hula Elstia, or Sonia Lanternlily to a variety of combat styles, and dress them up with various outfits.

name: LegacyShell
description: LegacyShell is a recreation of the old Shell Shockers game.

name: High Cars 2
description: Sky-high racing

name: Connect Pictures of Dog
description: Sin descripción

name: A Maze Against Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Motus
description: A short exploration game presented with black and white noise in a way that is impossible to see through static images.

name: Sheeeroom
description: You wish to bring "She" back to life to reclaim something precious you’ve lost. Solve the various puzzles set before you and gather what "She" needs. Even you don’t know what "She" truly is. "sheeeroom" is a mysterious adventure game.

name: I'm a Gensokyo Observer
description: You worked in a company known for getting rid of anomalies and any paranormal activities. One day, you received a letter from Yukari, asking for your assistance in Gensokyo about paranormal activities which this time, it's from a different source. You have to take care of the anomalies in Gensokyo and make Gensokyo safe again. Good luck.

name: Tundralia: The Frigid Frontier
description: Tundralia is an RPG in which you play as a novice adventurer, seeking to find fame and fortune in a frozen wasteland. Explore a stylized open world, fight as one of three classes using traditional tab target combat, complete quests, delve into dungeons, and collect a plethora of equipment.

name: Extreme Overtake
description: ExtremeOvertake,try to overtake all races.

name: Christmas Tree Decorator
description: Christmas Tree Decorator is a first-person simulator where you can unwind and decorate a Christmas tree. Whether you’re a casual fan or a dedicated celebrator, enjoy the cozy atmosphere free from pressures or perfectionism as you create your own unique holiday tree and decorations!

name: Perino Candy Buster
description: Dive into the vibrant world of Perino Ball Buster, an action-packed arcade game that combines classic Block Breaker gameplay with a delightful twist! Join Porino and friends on a whimsical adventure filled with colorful graphics, engaging stories, and competitive local multiplayer.

name: Zort
description: Zort is an action, adventure, and horror game that can be played with up to 4 people. Explore maps with your friends and have fun while escaping from various creatures. Experience a realistic horror experience with in-game voice chat with your friends!

name: Schoolboy Runaway
description: “You little rascal! Go study your lessons right now!” said the angry parents, grounding you. Try to outsmart them and find a way to have fun with your friends.

name: Tower of Mask
description: Survival horror RPG where new terrors await! This game inherits the charm of 1980s dungeon RPGs. Step into the mysterious deep tower where bizarre masked humans roam!

name: Chaotic Conflicts
description: Chaotic Conflicts is a casual and chaotic fast-paced Online FPS game. In this chaotic shooter you'll try to shoot your way to the top of the scoreboard while competing with other players and random events.

name: Sidereal
description: A tall man wanders across desolated worlds, stumbling beneath the endless stars.

name: Kinky Cosplay Heroes
description: Start your own sexy club, filling your staff with cute anime girls. Flirt with the girls, win their hearts, dress them up in the cutest outfits... And have fun with them in various sex scenes, all the while your business grows even while you are away.

name: Phantom Killer
description: Realistic graphics and graphics: With the power of Unreal Engine 5, we present players with a realistic and detailed game world.

name: Doggy Up!
description: Embark on an amazing and touching journey with our new game - Doggy Rise. This is an extraordinary story about the friendship between a disabled boy and his faithful dog. Alone or with a friend, help Liam and Ollie to overcome all the difficulties on their way.

name: Super Cambur: The Sacred Orbs
description: Our hero Super Cambur must travel the planet in search of the sacred orbs to stop Manisassoff's evil plans and not open the multiverse in this classic RPG full of color and magic!

name: PhaigeX: Hyperspace Survivors
description: PhaigeX is a fast-paced "survivor-style" space shooter that tasks the player to contain a growing incursion of rogue AI-controlled units. Pilot a variety of ships, use a myriad of upgrades and lay down heavy firepower against the growing menace.

name: 1 Trait Escape
description: An action rogue-lite set in the 1 Trait Danger universe. Fight your way through swarms of enemies and bosses with minigames sprinkled in-between. Grow stronger every time you fail until you are able to escape back to Earth.

name: Cloud Heart
description: A turn-based RPG and adventure game. Travel around the world and face various stories.

name: Bone Quest
description: Bone Quest is an RPG in which you play as a newly arisen skeleton, wanting to create a home for like minded creatures who have been shunned by human society. Rebuild a town, explore a open world, fight using traditional tab target combat, complete quests and collect a plethora of equipment.

name: Magenta Horizon: Neverending Harvest
description: Magenta Horizon is a fast-paced 2D action platformer game that is heavily inspired by the Spectacle Fighter genre. Playing as a Reaper of the twisted purgatorial afterlife, push your skills to the limit to destroy the hordes of demons and epic bosses to reach your destination.

name: Weirdlands
description: A charmingly quirky RPG where you catch and fuse spirits you fight, and layer by layer reveal deep, intricate lore. This single-player, turn-based RPG has a deceptively simple exterior, but within lie complexity and depth. It's bright and it's dark, it's witty and it's silly, and it's one of a kind.

name: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: Digital Premium Upgrade
description: Live the adventure with the Premium Upgrade to receive Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants Story DLC, a digital art book, and the Temple of Doom Outfit, Indy's iconic look as seen in Temple of Doom. Base Game not included.

name: Hamster Playground: Adventure & Style DLC Pack
description: Enhance your Hamster Playground with the Adventure & Style DLC Pack! Includes six themes - Spooky House, Hamster City, Kawaii, Doll House, Royal Hamsters, and Cute Pets - with new decorations, costumes, and quests. Let your hamsters explore new adventures in style!

name: Endless Deaths
description: Endless Deaths is a thrilling top-down twin-stick shooter rogue-like where players battle through procedurally generated zombie-infested levels, continuously leveling up and upgrading their gear to survive. With unique characters, special abilities, and a diverse arsenal of weapons, each playthrough offers fresh and exhilarating challenges.

name: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition contains:

-Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Game
-Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Artbook
-Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Strategy Guide

name: Shadow Tactics: Aiko's Choice - Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition contains Shadow Tactics: Aiko's Choice plus the complete Shadow Tactics soundtrack

name: Ballotron Mega Bundle
description: The Ballotron Mega Bundle includes several parts of the meditative puzzle Ballotron, as well as the colorful games Pirate Bloopers and Beat of Montezuma. The games are enjoyable and for the whole family.

name: Shadow Tactics: Ultimate Bundle
description: The complete Shadow Tactics experience in one bundle

name: Lord of the Click 4
description: In "Lord of the Click 4" you will find incredible new challenges, amazing graphics and improved mechanics. As a great monarch, you will fight many new and dangerous enemies using your clicker skills. Every click on your screen summons powerful warriors, deals crushing blows to enemies and directs the magic of nature into battle. But be careful — each level will bring even more powerful and treacherous bosses, who will have to be defeated to advance further.

name: 8Floor Bundle 4 in 1 part 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Fox Legend
description: The gamescore is achieved separately, that is, for each version you will earn an exclusive gamescore.

name: Bimfli and His Travels In Time: Greece
description: Bimfli and his travels in time is an interactive graphic novel about the adventures of Bimfli, a young architect.

name: Zundamon Castle

You are the Dark Queen—the most powerful being of your entire universe. Your lair is breached by an aspiring hero—a pitiful thing, easily crushed.

Except they keep coming back.

A 20 minute anti-game about an unconventional relationship and the capacity for change.

From what we can tell… it began out of curiosity.

Inspired by Doctor Doom and his never-ending quest to unravel the mysteries of time, Season 0 isn't just the beginning, it's the explosive start to innumerable conflicts beyond imagination. Between Doctor Doom and his counterpart from 2099, no one knows who will be the final victor, but everyone knows that the time has come to ignite the battle.

name: Teeter

name: Fortnite OG
description:
FORTNITE OG is BACK and here to stay. Drop into Chapter 1 and explore the OG map, collect OG loot, and relive OG gameplay.

THE OG OG RETURNS Solos or Squads, drop into battle with Fortnite OG: Chapter 1. Build your way to pure victory in Battle Royale or dominate the Island in a new way with Zero Build. Each Fortnite OG season runs approximately two months, bringing back the legendary loot and features from back in the day.

CLASSIC COOL IN THE OG PASS The Fortnite OG Pass features 45 tiers of retro rewards with a modern twist on items and Outfits. A new OG Pass will be available every OG season for 950 V-Bucks or in Fortnite Crew including the OG Pass, new Battle Royale, Music and LEGO Passes in Fortnite Crew for 1,400 V-Bucks. Getting this add-on is not necessary to access this content.

name: Unlight: Revive
description:
This is a story-centered competitive training card game. Players explore and conquer quest mode (single player) with character cards to obtain treasure chests, train and customize their character cards, and explore deck construction that suits their strategy, such as focusing on preemptive action, attack, defense, or overall balance. Not only do trained character cards increase their HP and attack/defense stats, but they also learn special moves unique to each character, which, when conditions are right, can deal significant damage and battle effects to enemies.

Deck construction is also a crucial factor when battling other players in Duel Mode (PvP), so build your deck carefully yet boldly.

name: Himei Dam
description: "Himei Dam" is a horror game where you patrol the dam at night with your senior, who has an afro. Recommended for: People who want to be scared People who want to be surprised People who want to try working at a dam Streamers known for their great reactions

name: The Permanent Residence: Souls Kept
description:
The Permanent Residence pulls you into the unsettling world of an isolated bungalow shrouded in mystery and dread. You step into the shoes of a traveling musician, stranded after your shows are suddenly canceled. Desperate and tempted by a 50% discount, you take up an offer to stay in this strange house, blissfully unaware of the horrors that await.

The once-quiet halls now hum with whispers, and the walls seem to hide secrets aching to be uncovered. As you piece together strange clues, the bungalow’s chilling history unfolds—a past filled with rituals, vanishings, and a dark presence that refuses to let go. Soon, you realize that walking out the door might not be as simple as walking in.

name: Inside the Forest
description: You and a group of friends decide to go on a camping trip in the Darkwood Forest, It starts off smoothly, but unforeseen events occur. and it’s only a matter of time before the true horror reveals itself.

name: Night Store Simulator

name: Chosen Card Chronicles

name: Santa Slides to Town
description: Santa Claus slides on his sleigh. Jump or double-jump or even triple-jump over obstacles. Gather stars to unlock new levels and upgrades. Reach the town as quickly as possible to set a new record. Use your collected stars to personalize the game's appearance.

name: My First Gran Turismo
description:
My First Gran Turismo is a free-to-play, beginner-friendly introduction to the world of racing, crafted to bring the excitement of Gran Turismo to new players. Whether you’re a parent introducing your family to racing or a longtime fan revisiting the series, My First GT captures the essence of those unforgettable first laps in a streamlined, approachable experience.

In My First Gran Turismo, players can unlock achievements by completing a variety of fun and engaging challenges that introduce essential racing techniques, such as cornering, braking, and acceleration. As you progress at each level, you will encounter increasingly intricate tracks and vehicles, each designed to build confidence and refine your driving skills, from basic to more advanced techniques, all in pursuit of mastering the craft of racing.

-Find your Line as you unlock various achievements and set record times across an array of challenges, including three Race Events, Time Trials and License Tests.

-Feel the exhilaration of driving 18 unique cars through a variety of scenarios that sharpen your racing craft on three iconic Gran Turismo circuits: Kyoto Driving Park, Deep Forest Raceway, and Trial Mountain Circuit.

When the situation gets critical, activate "ultra-sense", slow-down time and enhance your abilities. Embark on adventures through 48 levels, each offering unique challenges.

name: Fruit Mazes
description:
Fruit Mazes is a simple game for MSX 1, in a 16kb ROM using 16kb of RAM. The goal of the game is to navigate the maze in each stage and pick up all of the fruit in the maze within ten minutes, without touching the walls.

It features omnidirectional smooth scrolling, which is not typical of MSX 1 games since hardware scrolling is not a feature of the TMS9918 video chip used in MSX 1 computers.

The scrolling is achieved by pre-generating multiple sets of patterns, one set for each vertical scroll offset modulo 8, and by setting the TMS9918 pattern base address correspondingly.

The game also has accurate roll-on/roll-off of sprites at all sides of the viewport, achieved by setting the EC bit on every sprite and by pre-generating copies of the sprite patterns with pixels masked out from the right.

There are twelve stages, the second set of six stages has narrower corridors.

name: MemoryMaze
description: MemoryMaze is an atmospheric puzzle-platformer where you roll through vibrant, wind-swept levels, shift realities, and use the environment to solve puzzles. Explore hidden paths in a world full of color and mystery.

description:
Join Dog Man and the Supa Buddies on an epic adventure!

Dog Man: Mission Impawsible brings the beloved book series to life! Dive into this action-packed, humor-filled adventure. The key to the city has fallen into the hands of a supa bad guy, unlocking all the prison doors and releasing many evildoers. Help Dog Man and his friends chase down the supa bad guys in their most impawsible mission yet! Switch between Dog Man and his Supa Buddies, each with their own special abilities and gadgets such as Rocket Boots, Retractable Claws and Dirt Proof Pants. Together you can overcome challenging obstacles and defeat powerful bosses.

name: Forest Heroes
description: "Forest Heroes" combines tower defense with roguelike deck building. Enjoy intense battles and diverse strategies with simple controls!

name: Hunt Me
description: HUNT ME is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Gather the ingredients for the ritual, weaken the threat and banish it. Be careful, you're also the prey!

Walk around the tombs to open them and reveal their content, you require to get a key and a relic to be able to unlock the exit to the next level. But beware, the sorceress minions are upon you with their unique abilities.

name: Evilspunk
description: VR Action Rogue-Like shooter game. Dark enemies , Steampunk universe and fast paced gameplay. How well can you defend the church? Shed light on the darkness. The fate of humanity is at the tip of your barrel.

name: Aerial Cleaner
description: Players will take on the role of a high-altitude cleaner, using a water gun to clean dirt on tall buildings while also battling monsters flying around to protect their lives.

name: MasterChef: Learn to Cook!
description: If you enjoy cooking games or want to explore new recipes in a fun and interactive way, then MasterChef: Learn to Cook! It might be worth checking out. Get matched with other players around the globe. Choose your ingredients, slice, prepare, plate and serve delicious dishes with style in fun mini-games! The MasterChef judges will evaluate your dish based on your performance and speed. Complete and unlock new recipes, challenges, and mini-games along your cooking journey. MORE THAN 120 RECIPES!

name: Godzilla x Kong: Titan Chasers
description:
Discover the Siren Islands, an untamed territory filled with monsters.
Become a Titan Chaser to unravel the mysteries surrounding the Titan this 4X MMO strategy game. Are you ready to face epic monsters and witness the fury of Godzilla and Kong?

description: "Hypnosis Card 2" is a card battle game with deck building, introducing a new concept of body parts. Players can interact and battle with many girls through cards of different genres.

Fandisc for Speakeasy.

Players will revisit the original cast to experience side stories, new art, and a music player featuring the full soundtrack from the original game.

name: Marvel Rivals
description: Marvel Rivals is an hero shooter video game developed and published by NetEase Games in collaboration with Marvel Games. The game is free-to-play with a current line up of 33 characters from Marvel Comics.

name: What The Pak?!
description: What The Pak?! is an online, multiplayer party game. Play as little, mischievous monsters called PAK and annoy your life-long friends as much as you can. We genuinely ask that you don’t hold back. Throw them overboard and steal their chickens. They’ll be like “WHAT THE P…”

name: Cave Hikers
description: A relaxing and humorous 2D interactive cartoon mockumentary that follows three characters through a cavernous world, on a quest to find the mystical “cave with an infinite ceiling”.

description: Catch wild Égdimon, dig, build, craft, and explore an infinite world, in this open-world creature-taming and role-playing game.

name: Polismos
description: In Polismos you build and manage cities in the ancient Greek world. To ensure your city's prosperity you will need to care for your people, trade valuable resources, enact wise policies, and maybe even dominate other cities.

name: Sonic Megamix Mania
description: Sonic Megamix Mania is a fan-made mod of 'Sonic Mania Plus' that recreates the levels of the original 'Sonic Megamix' Sonic 1 Rom-Hack, as well as re-imagines them in a new mode!

description: Archons is a roguelite / survivor where you control two characters at the same time, the Archons. Upgrade your Archons with different weapons to blast your way through the hordes of parasites and gigantic bosses. Customize your upgrades to build your own unique playstyle.

name: Pico Topia
description: A tiny citybuilder where you combine islands to gather resources, complete missions, unlock new buildings and increase your build area.

name: Guns of Succubus 2
description: A boy named "Cain" has lost his memories. Join him and the musket-wielding succubus maid "Grenadier" as you shoot your way through hordes of diverse monster girls! Can he safely recover his memories and return to his happy days? That's entirely up to the choices you, the player, make!

name: Gunslinger Express
description: Defend a moving train against relentless bandit attacks. Shoot enemies, repair wagons and upgrade your character as you explore diverse regions each with unique guns, enemies and upgrades.

name: Fernageddon
description: A combat based RPG / strategy game.
